sentences.en: a blue suit that showed off her blonde hair to perfection.
sentences.cn: 使她那金黄色的头发美到了极致的蓝色套装。

sentences.en: He demands perfection in others, but cannot see faults in himself.
sentences.cn: 他对别人求全责备, 对自身的缺点却视而不见.

sentences.en: He is rarely satisfied with anything less than perfection itself.
sentences.cn: 他一般只对那些绝对完美的事情感到满意。

sentences.en: His body was honed to perfection.
sentences.cn: 他的身体锻炼得十全十美。

sentences.en: His car is always in the pink of perfection.
sentences.cn: 他的汽车性能总是极其良好.

sentences.en: It is unrealistic to believe perfection is an attainable goal.
sentences.cn: 相信完美可以企及是不现实的。

sentences.en: It was little by little that the watch reached its present - day perfection.
sentences.cn: 表渐渐地达到了现在这样完美的程度.

sentences.en: Mike can take off his father to perfection.
sentences.cn: 迈克模仿爸爸时惟妙惟肖。

sentences.en: My father expected perfection from all of us.
sentences.cn: 父亲期望我们都尽善尽美。

sentences.en: My idea of physical perfection is to be very slender.
sentences.cn: 在我看来，要拥有完美身材就要非常苗条。

sentences.en: Physical perfection in a human being is exceedingly rare.
sentences.cn: 体貌完美的人极为罕见。

sentences.en: The bowler judged it well, timing the ball to perfection.
sentences.cn: 投球手判断准确, 对球速的掌握恰到好处.

sentences.en: The fish was cooked to perfection .
The house and garden were perfection.
sentences.cn: 房屋和花园都非常漂亮。

sentences.en: Their works reach to a great height of perfection.
sentences.cn: 他们的作品到了极完美的境地.

sentences.en: They are working on the perfection of their new paint formula.
sentences.cn: 他们正在研制完善的新颜料配方.

words.tran_cn: 完美地；完全地；无瑕疵地
完全性；可改善性；可完美性
完美主义者，追求完美的人；至善论者

trans.tran_cn: 完美，完善，最后加工，圆满
